name: Margarita
instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed glass.
description: A classic tangy cocktail with tequila and lime.

name: Gin & Tonic
instructions: Build over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.
description: A refreshing and simple highball cocktail.
